data.eml:eml: New shore bug (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Saldidae) from the Early Cretaceous of China with phylogenetic analyses

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Weiting, Yao, Yunzhi, Ren, Dong (2011): New shore bug (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Saldidae) from the Early Cretaceous of China with phylogenetic analyses. ZooKeys 130: 185-198, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.130.1563, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.130.1563
